headline.print_headline: Study Links Smoking Drug To Cardiovascular Problems
headline.seo: Chantix, Smoking Cessation Drug, Linked to Cardiovascular Problems
headline.main: Study Links Smoking Drug to Cardiovascular Problems

docs.lead_paragraph: Chantix was linked to an increased risk of a heart attack or other serious cardiovascular event for smokers without a history of heart disease.
docs.snippet: Chantix was linked to an increased risk of a heart attack or other serious cardiovascular event for smokers without a history of heart disease.

headline.print_headline: In the ‘Stroke Belt,’ Erosion of Memory Is More Likely Too
headline.seo: In Southern ‘Stroke Belt,’ Cognitive Decline Is a Related Worry
headline.main: In the ‘Stroke Belt,’ Erosion of Memory Is More Likely Too

docs.lead_paragraph: A large national study suggests Southerners in certain states may not only be at greater risk of stroke but of a decline in cognitive ability over several years.
docs.snippet: A large national study suggests Southerners in certain states may not only be at greater risk of stroke but of a decline in cognitive ability over several years.
